questions: 1. How do the main findings of this paper compare to those of other studies that have examined the effects of bank expansion?
2. What are the key differences in the methods and approaches used in this paper compared to other studies on bank expansion?
3. How do the conclusions and implications of this paper contribute to the understanding of bank expansion and its treatment effects, in relation to previous research?
1. How do the main findings of the paper comparing the subjects differ from those of other research on the topic?
2. What are the key differences in the approaches, methodologies, or perspectives used in this paper compared to other research on the same topic?
3. How do the conclusions and implications of this paper compare to the broader body of knowledge on financial inclusion?
1. How do the main findings of the treated cities differ from those of the control cities regarding economic development?
2. What are the key differences in the subjects of the paper compared to other similar studies?
3. How do the methods and results of this paper contribute to the understanding of the relationship between bank presence and economic development?
